ultrapipe

Usage

you can use the utils.find_nearest() function:

utils.find_nearest(array, value)

A utility function that returns the index of the value in an array that is closest to the value provided.

Args:

array (np.array or similar): Array to find the nearest value. value (float or int): Value to find the closest value in the array

Returns:

index (int): The index of the element in the array that is closest to the provided value.
